org.forgerock.opendj.server.config.server

Interface SubjectEqualsDNCertificateMapperCfg

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CertificateMapperCfg, Configuration

    public interface SubjectEqualsDNCertificateMapperCfg
extends CertificateMapperCfg
    A server-side interface for querying Subject Equals DN Certificate Mapper settings.

    The Subject Equals DN Certificate Mapper maps client certificates to user entries based on the assumption that the certificate subject is the same as the DN of the target user entry.
